rComments: I've had four of KELEMA not Kalema's classes. She is a phenomenal professor, best one that I've ever had by far. She is extremely helpful and approachable. She is pretty young and extraordinarily intelligent. She is the only professor I have had that makes her subject  interesting and always has her ducks in a row. ROCK ON KELEMEA.
Kelema is an amazing professor! Super passionate lectures, lots of supplemental help if needed, and pretty fair exams! Would highly recommend!

Very uninteresting class. She really cares about the subject, but unfortunately its a very frustrating one. As an Econ major I had a very difficult time trying to decipher the meaning behind blobs and squares.

Worst class/teacher I've had at ucsc. The reviews on here are clearly from HAVC majors. There is no textbook, and she doesn't post lecture slides online even though she claims to. All course content comes from her talking in class. The slides she shows in class are just paintings. It's also abstract paintings so you'll primarily be looking at blobs

Very helpful! Enjoyed taking her class. Is a very devoted professor always concerned about the student needs. She is always there to help you in any way if you have questions or comments. I extremely recommend her.
The best!!! She is so helpful and dedicated to the subject matter. She gives tons of extra credit opportunities which makes the class relatively easy and enjoyable. Go to lectures and you'll be fine.

Kelema is extremely approachable and considerate. Don't take her lectures for granted, when she repeats something, write it down. Never had to buy any textbooks whilst in her classes (and I've taken 3 of her classes) because she has everything you need, inc. online readings. Slide ID exams, comparison essays, and a major essay question: all doable.

All readings are online. Two slide identification tests, one midterm, and a final.If you actually go to class, take notes, and study you will be more than fine!!! Interesting material and she is very cool.
